name: Long-Roasted New Potatoes
keywords: new potatoes, olive oil, rosemary, side dish, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 2 pounds small new potatoes, scrubbed but not peeled
Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Select a baking dish just large enough to hold the potatoes in a single layer. Pour the olive oil into it. Add the potatoes and, with your hands, roll them around in the oil until they are all have a light coating on them. Season to taste with salt and pepper and roll the potatoes around once more.
Put in the oven and bake for an hour an a half, turning the potatoes once or twice during baking.
Sprinkle with rosemary and serve hot or set aside to cool to room temperature, then serve.
